languages.text: "И что функция ликования разблокирована. Славный был железный жрец, жаль терять такого товарища. Но в душе он все же был воином, и Всеотец подарил ему высшую награду для воителя — славную смерть в битве. Выпьем за него на пиру, чтобы Железный Волк был милостив к его бинарному духу".

"And that it has unlocked his jubilation functionality. He was a fine priest, and it's a shame to lose a comrade like him. He was a warrior at heart, so the Allfather granted him the highest warrior's honour — a glorious death in battle. We will drink to his memory at the feast so that the Iron Wolf may be merciful to his binharic spirit."
languages.original_text: "И что функция ликования разблокирована. Славный был железный жрец, жаль терять такого товарища. Но в душе он все же был воином, и Всеотец подарил ему высшую награду для воителя — славную смерть в битве. Выпьем за него на пиру, чтобы Железный Волк был милостив к его бинарному духу".

He was a warrior at heart, so the Allfather granted him the highest warrior's honour — a glorious death in battle. We will drink to his memory at the feast so that the Iron Wolf may be merciful to his binharic spirit."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

We will drink to his memory at the feast so that the Iron Wolf may be merciful to his binharic spirit."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: “他肯定还会激活欢庆功能。他是位优秀的神甫，失去他这样的战友实在是太可惜了。他骨子里是位战士，因此，全父赐予了他身为战士的最高荣誉，那便是光荣战死。等到举行宴会的时候，我们会举杯悼念他。愿铁狼仁慈对待他的二进制灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "And that it has unlocked his jubilation functionality. He was a fine priest, and it's a shame to lose a comrade like him. He was a warrior at heart, so the Allfather granted him the highest warrior's honour — a glorious death in battle. We will drink to his memory at the feast so that the Iron Wolf may be merciful to his binharic spirit."

traits.locale_text: “他肯定还会激活欢庆功能。他是位优秀的祭司，失去他这样的战友实在是太可惜了。他骨子里是位战士，因此，全父赐予了他身为战士的最高荣誉，那便是光荣战死。等到举行宴会的时候，我们会举杯悼念他。愿铁狼仁慈对待他的二进制灵魂。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: « Et que ça a débloqué sa fonction de jubilation. C'était un bon prêtre, c'est bien triste d'avoir perdu un camarade comme lui. Mais il avait le cœur d'un guerrier, alors le Père de Tous lui a accordé le plus grand honneur qu'on puisse faire aux soldats : une mort glorieuse au combat. Nous trinquerons à sa mémoire lors du banquet, pour que le Loup de Fer se montre clément envers son esprit binhaire. »
languages.original_text: "And that it has unlocked his jubilation functionality. He was a fine priest, and it's a shame to lose a comrade like him. He was a warrior at heart, so the Allfather granted him the highest warrior's honour — a glorious death in battle. We will drink to his memory at the feast so that the Iron Wolf may be merciful to his binharic spirit."

traits.locale_text: « Et que ça a débloqué sa fonction de jubilation. C'était un bon prêtre, c'est bien triste d'avoir perdu un camarade comme lui. Mais il avait le cœur d'un guerrier, alors le Père de Tous lui a accordé le plus grand honneur qu'on puisse faire aux soldats : une mort glorieuse au combat. Nous trinquerons à sa mémoire lors du banquet, pour que le Loup de Fer se montre clément envers son esprit binhaire. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: 「そして、そのおかげで彼の歓喜の機能を解き放ったと言っていただろう。彼は立派な司祭だった…彼のような仲間を失うのは残念だ。彼は根っからの戦士だったから、全知の父は彼に戦士として最高の栄誉を与えたーー戦で名誉ある死を遂げたのだ。アイアンウルフが彼のバイナリックの魂に慈悲を与えられるよう、我々は宴で彼の思い出を語りながら酒を酌み交わそう」
languages.original_text: "And that it has unlocked his jubilation functionality. He was a fine priest, and it's a shame to lose a comrade like him. He was a warrior at heart, so the Allfather granted him the highest warrior's honour — a glorious death in battle. We will drink to his memory at the feast so that the Iron Wolf may be merciful to his binharic spirit."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、そのおかげで彼の歓喜の機能を解き放ったと言っていただろう。彼は立派な司祭だった…彼のような仲間を失うのは残念だ。彼は根っからの戦士だったから、全知の父は彼に戦士として最高の栄誉を与えたーー戦で名誉ある死を遂げたのだ。アイアンウルフが彼のバイナリックの魂に慈悲を与えられるよう、我々は宴で彼の思い出を語りながら酒を酌み交わそう」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: «Y habría dicho que había desbloqueado la función de júbilo. Era un sacerdote ejemplar; fue una lástima perder a un camarada como él. Como era un guerrero empedernido, el Padre de todas las cosas le concedió el mayor honor de todos: una muerte gloriosa en combate. Brindaremos por él en el banquete para que el Lobo de Hierro se apiade de su espíritu binario».
languages.original_text: "And that it has unlocked his jubilation functionality. He was a fine priest, and it's a shame to lose a comrade like him. He was a warrior at heart, so the Allfather granted him the highest warrior's honour — a glorious death in battle. We will drink to his memory at the feast so that the Iron Wolf may be merciful to his binharic spirit."

traits.locale_text: «Y habría dicho que había desbloqueado la función de júbilo. Era un sacerdote ejemplar; fue una lástima perder a un camarada como él. Como era un guerrero empedernido, el Padre de todas las cosas le concedió el mayor honor de todos: una muerte gloriosa en combate. Brindaremos por él en el banquete para que el Lobo de Hierro se apiade de su espíritu binario».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Und dass dadurch seine Jubilier-Funktion freigeschaltet wurde. Er war ein guter Priester, es ist ein Jammer, einen Kameraden wie ihn zu verlieren. Er war im Herzen ein Krieger, daher hat der Allvater ihm die höchste Ehre eines Kriegers gewährt — einen glorreichen Tod in der Schlacht. Wir werden bei dem Gelage auf sein Andenken anstoßen, damit der Eisenwolf seinem binhären Geist gegenüber gnädig ist."
languages.original_text: "And that it has unlocked his jubilation functionality. He was a fine priest, and it's a shame to lose a comrade like him. He was a warrior at heart, so the Allfather granted him the highest warrior's honour — a glorious death in battle. We will drink to his memory at the feast so that the Iron Wolf may be merciful to his binharic spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Und dass dadurch seine Jubilier-Funktion freigeschaltet wurde. Er war ein guter Priester, es ist ein Jammer, einen Kameraden wie ihn zu verlieren. Er war im Herzen ein Krieger, daher hat der Allvater ihm die höchste Ehre eines Kriegers gewährt — einen glorreichen Tod in der Schlacht. Wir werden bei dem Gelage auf sein Andenken anstoßen, damit der Eisenwolf seinem binhären Geist gegenüber gnädig ist."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Sevinç işlevini etkinleştirdiğini de söylerdi. İyi bir rahipti. Onun gibi bir yoldaşın ölümü, acı bir kayıp. Özünde değerli bir savaşçıydı, bu yüzden Yücebaba ona bir savaşçının nail olabileceği en büyük onurunu, savaşta görkemli bir ölümü bahşetti. Ziyafette onun anısına içeceğiz... İçeceğiz ki Demir Kurt, onun ikilidil ruhuna merhamet etsin."
languages.original_text: "And that it has unlocked his jubilation functionality. He was a fine priest, and it's a shame to lose a comrade like him. He was a warrior at heart, so the Allfather granted him the highest warrior's honour — a glorious death in battle. We will drink to his memory at the feast so that the Iron Wolf may be merciful to his binharic spirit."
